version_description:
1.Fixed some annoying bugs.
2.Correct Multi-language translation mistake.

1.Video Interaction : Broadcast with up to 3 your friends!
2.Design Upgrade : To present you more contemporary style : )
3.Bugs fixed: Fixed some annoying bugs
Fixed some pesky bugs

修複已知Bug

如果覺得新版本不錯，可以考慮在App Store 給我們一個五星評價，讓我們繼續努力~
如果在使用中遇到任何問題，可以隨時通過客戶端的［用戶反饋］提交給我們，我們會認真回複每一條意見！

1、新增個人動態，留下每個值得紀念的瞬間
2、多樣化的禮物，讓主播變變變，變女仆、變米奇、變精靈，快來開啓百變主播時代！
3、U幣貢獻榜新增日榜和月榜，據說榮登榜首會有不一樣的炫耀方式
4、優化多處用戶體驗，等你發現

1、VIPs' exclusive priviledges-cool head frames that are newly designed, everyone will recognize your status;
2、Brand new "Discover" channel could help you locate broadcasters that are nearby, Let's hang out!
3、There are a few secret optimizations to help you enjoy superior experience by using Uplive.

1、New car animation makes you more dazzling in chatroom;
2、Red Packet has been updated and now can share with others, don’t forget share the good content with others when you are sharing the luck;
3、“Nearby" function is now available, hurry up, find the hosts around you and interact with them~
4、Hot list shows the live title, the title will attract more people to see~
5、multiple detail optimization, do it whole-heartedly for you!

1、VIPs' exclusive priviledges-cool head frames that are newly designed, everyone will recognize your status;
2、Brand new "Discover" channel could help you locate broadcasters that are nearby, Let's hang out!
3、There are a few secret optimizations to help you enjoy superior experience by using Uplive.

1. Lucky Gift - Lucky Gift is here. Send gifts to earn uDiamonds. Send more to earn more. You can earn 500X uDiamonds!
2. Send gifts in IM without adding friends. Send gifts to your favorite broadcaster right away.
3. Follow your favorite broadcasters directly in the official account of a event when they are performing. You do not have to search for them any more.
4. The World Cup is coming! We have surprise for you~
5. Bug fixes.

2. Support horizontal live mode
3. Personal center entry streamlined
4. User experience optimized. Bug fixes.

【Party+Group chat, Let's have some FUN!】
Isn’t it hard to get someone’s phone number?
It’s even harder when you need to talk to them one on one….AWKWARD;/
Now forget about these troubles once you update to this latest version Uplive!
We’ve got “Create Group Chat” feature for you right after each party that you throw, and once you guys are in the same group chat, you could always start a party by just ONE CLICK!
Try it now and heat it up!

【New battle season with brand new upgraded battle system】
